Text.Name: Eat
Text.Tip: Eating Food: once in the Learning Stage, you can select food in the panel.

Text.Name: Fun
Text.Tip: Increase leisure. Different behaviors' increasing rate will vary.

Text.Name: Shit
Text.Tip: Defecation is possible in different places.

Text.Name: Help
Text.Tip: Help Inner Disciples or Outer Disciples.

Text.Name: HighHelp
Text.Tip: Assist with Practice. Requires 80 Intelligence to unlock.

Text.Name: Carry
Text.Tip: Haul unconscious or deceased characters. Requires 50 Intelligence to unlock.

Text.Name: Train
Text.Tip: Exercise raises all Stats and the effects of it can be improved with food and drink. The greater the effects of the food and drink consumed, the greater the results of training will be. Must reach Learning Stage to unlock.
